skill.name: markitdown
skill.description: Convert files and office documents to Markdown. Supports PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, images (with OCR), audio (with transcription), HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, ZIP, YouTube URLs, EPubs and more.
skill.summary: Convert files and office documents to Markdown. Supports PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, images (with OCR), a...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: Static findings are false positives. The scanner incorrectly flagged markdown code blocks (using backticks) as shell execution, and legitimate document conversion patterns as suspicious. The skill is a Microsoft tool for converting documents to Markdown with expected file I/O and API access.

content.value_statement: Converting documents to Markdown makes them token-efficient and easy to process for AI models. MarkItDown supports 15+ formats including PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, images, audio, and web pages.
actual_capabilities: Convert PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX to Markdown
Extract text from images using OCR
limitations: AI features need OpenRouter API key
Complex formatting may not fully translate

use_cases.title: Convert papers to Markdown
use_cases.description: Transform PDF research papers into clean Markdown for AI analysis and literature review workflows.

use_cases.title: Process office documents
use_cases.description: Convert Word docs, PowerPoint slides, and Excel sheets to Markdown for content repurposing.

use_cases.title: Batch convert archives
use_cases.description: Process multiple document formats in batch for pipeline integration and documentation automation.

prompt_templates.title: Basic PDF conversion
prompt_templates.prompt: Use MarkItDown to convert research_paper.pdf to Markdown and save the output to paper.md

prompt_templates.title: Batch processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert all PDF files in the papers/ directory to Markdown files in the markdown_output/ directory using MarkItDown

prompt_templates.title: AI-enhanced slides
prompt_templates.prompt: Use MarkItDown with OpenRouter to convert presentation.pptx. Configure Claude Sonnet to describe the slide images in detail.

prompt_templates.title: YouTube transcription
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert the YouTube video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID to Markdown transcript using MarkItDown

best_practices: Install MarkItDown with all features using pip install markitdown[all]
Use AI-enhanced mode with Claude Sonnet for detailed image descriptions in presentations
Organize converted files with meaningful filenames and directory structure
anti_patterns: Do not use for converting confidential documents without reviewing the security implications
Do not expose API keys in shared scripts or version control
Do not assume all formatting will perfectly translate from complex PDFs

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, images (OCR), audio (transcription), HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, ZIP, EPUB, and YouTube URLs.

faq.question: Do I need an API key?
faq.answer: Basic conversion works without API keys. AI image descriptions require an OpenRouter API key.

faq.question: How does OCR work?
faq.answer: MarkItDown uses tesseract for OCR on images. Install with pip install markitdown[all] or separately.

faq.question: Can I convert password protected files?
faq.answer: No. MarkItDown cannot convert password-protected or encrypted documents.

faq.question: Is this suitable for legal documents?
faq.answer: Conversion preserves content but may not maintain exact formatting. Review output for accuracy in critical use cases.

faq.question: How does batch conversion work?
faq.answer: Use the batch_convert.py script to process multiple files with parallel workers for efficiency.
